task.summary: Default task
TXView incorporated
Separate key creation included, reply to info separated by node
Basic explorer framework in place, separated the POST into _debug files
Bug fix missing blockdatahash, expand explorer vertical view
Visualisation improved to wait for token arrival, small bug fixes
Split visual.html into sub-js, bug fix in tablify ':':, new debug option
Refined coms run,freeze, suspend in visual, check peer must be BCNode always
Bug fix and new minerSpecificBlock for miner; TX checks use address length; permit negative pending balance
Discon safeBalance as a node duty; cleaned code in balance
Bug fixes in miner and node, mining works again
Race condition and stack overload in visual cleared, miner flags simplified
Improved visual timers, fixed bug in peers exception, allow miner get but not calculate
Stricter addr and pubKey verifications on content and len
Peers completely rewritten, need to clear code from left overs
Peers synch over all cases/links, still need upgrade from shareToPeers
Miner linked to wallet to have always same address even after restart
minor bugfix wallet (include sha256), and coms with 1 peers
Complete structure and initial functionality for GenesisBlock
Genesis generation completed, hardened chain init in main, set PDPCCoin
Cleaned up and removed default 400 in errMsg calls
Small bug fixes after recent changes, visual works again
Initial faucet implementation up to simple donation
Faucet almost complete, removed all duplicates from wallet in code
Tightened faucet checks
Miner now respsonible to change date and nonce, removed check in node, moved safeBalance to wallet client
Bug fix in faucet on pubKey and reply when peer is missing
Created blocks/hash for faster verification and better visual
Fixed miner and block error due to refactoring, corrected peer
Optimised visual script; start tokens URL dependent; small bug fix
Miner and peer and block bug fixes after refactor
Optimised peer to avoid duplicate info queries with peers
Finally, peer block won dice and overwrote local miner already on the block
Quick code cleanup
PoW conflict solved for direct clash, reset chain else
Fix small bugs (e.g. peer); init before peer; visualise block info for node
Visual shows different chains in two colors
fix bugs in faucet and candidate block tx generation
bug: empty balance return 0 not warning, basecoin must be first TX
bug: return in jsonify, new: alert peer when info shows lag in chain
bug: deadlock on multiple POST; new: visualise miner data
First version of consensus backtracking, overwritten TX still lost
Better visual, tighter URL control, remove http-prefix from regex
Refactor tablify, DoDirect; standard NodeInfo
Pad signature with leading '0', fix correction: TXreply is 201
Code clean-up, rvise asynch multicast delay
wallet html cleared, issue with unsuccessful TX found, need recoding?
Insufficient balance rejects Tx immediately, no more unsuccessful TX
Cleared several TODO items, verify TX-hash between wallet and Node
Typo in genesis block file spacing removed
